skumb.title: Skumb
skumb.p1: Skumb is a simple, anonymous, and secure chat platform with a focus on privacy.
skumb.p2: Create a new chat instantly without registration and share the link with friends, colleagues, or family.
skumb.p3: Each chat is end-to-end encrypted using reliable, proven algorithms.
skumb.p4: This is a volatile chat — messages aren’t stored anywhere. Closing or refreshing the page erases all messages (current anonymous version).

anonymous-chat.title: Anonymous chat
anonymous-chat.p1: Need to share a private key, password, or other sensitive information without leaving a trace? Use
anonymous-chat.p2: No questions, no storage, no registration required. Once a chat ends, your messages are gone. No turning back.

whistle-blowing.title: Whistleblowing (coming soon)
whistle-blowing.p1: For organizations or journalists looking for a secure, anonymous way to communicate, Skumb offers a safe contact point.
whistle-blowing.p2: Receive first-hand information on breaches, leaks, or other sensitive topics in a secure environment that only you control but respects the privacy of your sources.

surveillance.title: Chat without remorse surveillance (coming soon)
surveillance.p1: Want a secure, modern chat experience free from data tracking and surveillance?
surveillance.p2: Avoid supporting data collection and retention policies that infringe on privacy. Use Skumb.
surveillance.p3: Protect privacy, security, anonymity, and the human rights to dignity and freedom of speech.

support.title: Made with love in Rust and Vue (support coming soon)
support.p1: As an independent project, we’re always open to support and shared love.
